original_text: And he opened the bottomless pit; and there arose a smoke out of the pit, as the smoke of a great furnace; and the sun and the air were darkened by reason of the smoke of the pit.
korean_text: 그가 무저갱을 여니 그 구멍에서 큰 화덕의 연기 같은 연기가 올라오매 해와 공기가 그 구멍의 연기로 말미암아 어두워지며

sentences.original_text: And he opened the bottomless pit
and there arose a smoke out of the pit
as the smoke of a great furnace
and the sun and the air were darkened
by reason of the smoke of the pit
